name: Recipe & Cooking App
description: Recipe management, meal planning, and grocery shopping app

issues.title: Build recipe database and browsing
issues.body:
## Description
Create recipe catalog with search and filters.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Recipe listings
- [ ] Search functionality
- [ ] Filter by cuisine/diet
- [ ] Recipe details page
- [ ] Cooking instructions

issues.title: Create recipe submission and editing
issues.body:
## Description
Allow users to add their own recipes.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Recipe form
- [ ] Ingredient list
- [ ] Step-by-step instructions
- [ ] Photo upload
- [ ] Edit/delete recipes

issues.title: Implement favorites and collections
issues.body:
## Description
Save and organize favorite recipes.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Favorite recipes
- [ ] Create collections
- [ ] Organize by tags
- [ ] Quick access
- [ ] Share collections

issues.title: Add cooking timer and tools
issues.body:
## Description
Built-in cooking utilities.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Multiple timers
- [ ] Unit converter
- [ ] Serving calculator
- [ ] Step highlighting
- [ ] Voice control

issues.title: Build meal planning calendar
issues.body:
## Description
Weekly meal planning interface.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Drag-drop planner
- [ ] Weekly view
- [ ] Leftover tracking
- [ ] Prep time estimates
- [ ] Calendar sync

issues.title: Create smart grocery list
issues.body:
## Description
Auto-generate shopping lists from meal plans.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Auto-generate from recipes
- [ ] Combine ingredients
- [ ] Store organization
- [ ] Check off items
- [ ] Share with family

issues.title: Implement ratings and reviews
issues.body:
## Description
Rate and review recipes.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Star ratings
- [ ] Written reviews
- [ ] Photos from users
- [ ] Recipe tips
- [ ] Helpful votes

issues.title: Add nutritional information
issues.body:
## Description
Display nutrition facts for recipes.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Calorie calculation
- [ ] Macro breakdown
- [ ] Allergen warnings
- [ ] Dietary labels
- [ ] Per-serving info
